title: Attitude Change MOOC for Human Trafficking Prevention

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of human trafficking concepts
context.additional_context: Mobile learning environment optimized for smartphones, targeting office/administrative professionals, with a focus on formative assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three types and social impacts of human trafficking.
Learners can suggest two personal action plans for preventing human trafficking.
Through individual projects in a MOOC, learners can design prevention strategies applicable to local communities.
By analyzing lecture videos and case studies, learners enhance their critical thinking skills regarding human trafficking issues.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
